1.  msys

2.  pacman -S nasm gcc
    //nasm-2.14.03rc2-win64.zip

3.  config.guess  config.sub

4.
[shared]
./configure --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-win32thread --disable-avs --prefix=/d/000/xxx
[static]
./configure --enable-static --disable-win32thread --disable-avs --prefix=/d/000/xxx --extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def

CC=cl ./configure --prefix=/d/000/xxx --enable-shared --disable-win32thread --disable-avs --extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def

5.   make -j4


===========================================================
VS2015 cl.exe编译x2654
1 打开VS2015 x64命令行
2 设置msys2_shell.cmd的配置set MSYS2_PATH_TYPE=inherit
3 打开mingw64输入msys2_shell.cmd -mingw64
4 
动态库
CC=cl.exe ./configure --prefix=/d/000/xxx --enable-shared --disable-win32thread --disable-avs --extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def
静态库
CC=cl.exe ./configure --prefix=/d/000/xxx --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-win32thread --disable-avs --extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def

>>>>Thread
CC=cl.exe ./configure --prefix=/d/000/xxx --enable-shared --enable-static --extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def


make -j8
make install
============================================================
